qti-content-body.p: Correct! The expression 2+2+2 represents adding 2 three times, which is shown by 3 rows of 2 sharks.
Not quite. The expression 2+2+2 means we have 3 groups of 2. The correct image should show 3 rows with 2 sharks in each row.
